1.title: Defending Your Honor
1.plot: Casey investigates why she was rejected from CRU Law School.

2.title: Fools Rush In
2.plot: Its Rush week at CRU. The kappa tau decide to try to get pledges. Kacey becomes housemother of zbz. Dale gets into Omega-Chi. Someone calls the cops on the kappa tau's secret rush party.

3.title: Cross Examined Life
3.plot: Ashleigh and Katherine return to campus.

4.title: All About Beav
4.plot: Beaver finds an unlikely love interest in Katherine.

5.title: Home Coming and Going
5.plot: Cappie tries to impress Peter's dad and Calvin discovers Heath's secret.

7.title: Midnight Clear
7.plot: A snowstorm finally hits CRU and the gang retreats to Dobbler's.

8.title: Subclass Plagiostomi
8.plot: Ashleigh begins to question her relationship with Simon.

9.title: Agents for Change
9.plot: Frannie returns with a promise she can't keep.

10.title: Legacy
10.plot: In the finale, the KTs fight to save their house from demolition.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Rusty wants to join a very important Fraternity.

2.title: Hazed and Confused
2.plot: Rusty's first pledge activity with Kappa Tau, a beer pong tournament with Omega Chi, interferes with an important assignment. Casey get back at Sorority Sister Rebecca Logan for sleeping with Evan with disastrous results.

3.title: The Rusty Nail
3.plot: Rusty must find a date for his first fraternity mixer. Cappie sets him up with a " sure thing" now Rusty must make an important decision about his first time.

4.title: Picking Teams
4.plot: Rusty works with roommate Dale to find a way into the Fraternity floor-Hockey tournament. Evan worries about Casey allegiance to Omega Chi team. Casey devises a way to help Omega Chi beat Kappa Tau

5.title: Liquid Courage
5.plot: Rusty must steal a piece of equipment from the university to fix Mount Vesuvius, a homemade volcano, for a traditional Kappa Tau party. Casey questions Evans Loyalty when his father makes him take Rebbecca Logan to a dinner instead of her.

6.title: Friday Night Frights
6.plot: It's a stormy night, even the Greek students stay in. For the KT's that's no problem, partying being their forte, except that Cappie is in a rare non-dating mood. It gets interesting when a foxy girl turns up and seems obsessed with him, and Rusty fears she may be the escaped mental asylum patient reported on the radio, but next finds out that she knew his big brother. Evan is trapped in the Omega frat house with his closest-pledge and a rodent. Logan senses rival Casey's girlish Zeta bonding 'fun night' is an early electoral ploy, so she sabotages it, playing on the ...

7.title: Multiple Choice
7.plot: Rusty considers cheating to make it through demanding mid-terms. Cappie secretly gets himself paired with Casey on a project.

8.title: Separation Anxiety
8.plot: Rusty braves Cappie's warning that 'love is a female ploy' and declares his love to Jen K. Getting a mere 'thank you' he's down enough to be dragged to a strip club. Heath was neglected once too often, so he followed another mate there. Cappie turns out to be a regular and even has his own pole act, but also gets drunk enough to confess his own love story tragedy; Rusty reconsiders. A sorority-Bible Club collaboration to please national HQ leads to Dale chasing Casey out of character.

9.title: Depth Perception
9.plot: Casey and Frannie both compete for the coveted position of Omega Chi Sweetheart, causing a rift between the girls. Rusty and Jen K. try to find times to be alone together, but working around Dale's schedule is difficult.

10.title: Black & White and Read All Over
10.plot: An article written by Rusty's girlfriend shakes the whole Greek system especially the Zetas. Rusty must now choose between his first love and his fraternity brothers.

11.title: A New Normal
11.plot: Upon a return to school the Greeks face a new list of rules. Casey, now president of the Zetas, must deal with the aftermath of the article as well as the visit from a national representative. Rusty is still trying to get over his break-up. The Zetas face ridicule at a school carnival.

12.title: The Great Cappie
12.plot: To keep Zeta together Casey must work with cappie to plan a prohibition drinking party in the basement while they sponsor a "Great Gatsby" party as cover upstairs.

13.title: Highway to the Discomfort Zone
13.plot: Cappie tells Casey about him dating Rebecca and he will be her date for the big sister little sister double. Casey finds a great date be he turns out not to be what he appears. Rusty hopes the pledge project will bond him with the other pledges but they have other ideas. Dale offers to make Calvin straight

14.title: War and Peace
14.plot: Cappie and Evan's rivalry becomes a series of pranks between Kappa Tau and Omega Chi. Rusty's attempt at peacemaking lead to a trouble between him and Calvin

15.title: Freshman Daze
15.plot: A reinstated Greek ball brings memories of freshman year for Cappie, Casey, and Evan. We learn how Cappie and Evan came from childhood friends to rivals. Casey learns how Frannie stood up for her.

16.title: Move On. Cartwrights
16.plot: Casey and Evan has trouble normalizing relations between Omega Chi and Zeta Beta. Rebecca has trouble taking care Cappie during his illness like Casey did. Rusty has trouble keeping his new girl interested while Dale wants his new girl to back off.

17.title: 47 Hours and 11 Minutes
17.plot: Parents Weekend brings turmoil to the students of Cyprus Rhodes.

18.title: Mr. Purr-fect
18.plot: The sisters of the Zeta Beta Zeta house each coach a different fraternity for the annual ZBZ Games, but the real competition is between Rebecca and Casey.

19.title: No Campus for Old Rules
19.plot: Casey faces backlash when she bends house rules for Ashleigh. Rusty meets a coed bent on dismantling the Greek system and finds himself attracted to her despite their clashing ideals.

20.title: A Tale of Two Parties
20.plot: When Omega Chi has a party to celebrate Evan's saving them from the new restrictions Cappie decides Kappa Tau must have a competing party but they are broke. Casey makes Rebecca the Sober Sister to keep here from going to Cappie's party instead. Rusty must decide how to break up with Tina when he decides a sex only relationship is not all he wants. Evan makes Calvin keep other guys from Casey. Calvin's new boyfriend seems hesitant.

21.title: Barely Legal
21.plot: Spring Break has arrived, Cappie gets pledges to create fake Id's, bringing Rusty into some trouble. Casey goes to Evan for help with her LSAT test, and in the process she begins to question her future.

22.title: Spring Broke
22.plot: While the students enjoy spring break on the beach, Rusty returns to school and reunites with his old friends.

1.title: Brothers & Sisters
1.plot: Spring semester begins with the annual Greek Week competition. Rebecca continues to lash out and damage her relationships with her sisters in the ZBZ house. In the interest of preserving their friendship, Rusty and Calvin try to remain neutral despite belonging to rival fraternities.

2.title: Crush Landing
2.plot: ZBZ throws an awesome crush party, whilst Ashleigh discovers that the "hotness monster" goes to Cyprus-Rhodes. Casey is in "processing" with Franny over Evan. Rusty feels that he has lost interest in polymer-science and Rebecca needs Cappie more than she has ever needed, when she finds that her parents are to divorce.

3.title: Let's Make a Deal
3.plot: To raise money to alleviate Ashleigh's huge credit card debt, she and Casey decide to participate in Omega Chi's casino themed party.

4.title: Gays, Ghosts, and Gamma Rays
4.plot: Rusty and the pledges study for their, know your brother, tests for KT. While collecting information Rusty comes across a mysterious KT and investigates.Calvin is nervous as his new boyfriend forces him to explore gay life, including his first visit to a gay club where he meets an old friend

5.title: Pledge Allegiance
5.plot: Feeling mistreated, the Kappa Tau pledges revolt against the brothers. Evan exploits Calvin's relationship with Michael in an attempt to fix the grade of a brother that is failing.

6.title: See You Next Time, Sisters!
6.plot: Politics play a heavy hand when Casey and Frannie each lobby for support at the ZBZ national convention.

7.title: Formally Yours
7.plot: It's the ZBZ Formal and Casey and Max decide to go together. At the event, Ashleigh and Rusty bond. Also, Rebecca decides to skip the event claiming she needs a break from sorority events.

8.title: The Popular Vote
8.plot: Rusty and Cappie attend a speed dating event and both end up with dates. Casey and Ashleigh try to uncover some dirt on Frannie as candidates for ZBZ presidency quickly resort to smear campaigns.

9.title: Three's a Crowd
9.plot: Rusty learns a secret about Dale's high-schoolfriend; Ashley becomes caught in the middle of a power struggle between Casey and Frannie as they pursue the Omega Chi's for partnership for the upcoming school year.

10.title: Hell Week
10.plot: Pledges are put through the ringer during Hell Week. Casey and Max find that their time together may be coming to an abrupt end.

11.title: Take Me Home, Cyprus Rhodes
11.plot: A new school year begins, bringing changes to all CRU students.

12.title: From Rushing with Love
12.plot: Rusty and Calvin each try to recruit Andy to their respective fraternities. Casey and Ashleigh suspect that Rebecca may be a double agent working for Frannie.

13.title: Engendered Species
13.plot: Rusty meets a new girl, Casey seeks to resolve the problems between Max and Cappie and Calvin has problems with a noisy roommate. The ZBZ's have a new cleaner who Ashley amongst others find a bit distracting.

14.title: Big Littles and Jumbo Shrimp
14.plot: Rusty has struggles to accept Andy as his little brother while still brooding about Andy dating Jordan.

15.title: Evasive Actions
15.plot: The Zeta Beta Zeta and Iota Kappa Iota sororities engage in a game of dodgeball.

16.title: Dearly Beloved
16.plot: The Zeta Beta Zeta girls are all invited to the wedding of a beloved alumna.

17.title: Guilty Treasures
17.plot: Casey finds out about an overseas internship for Max, and gets him the bid by sneaking him into a faculty party. When chasing out an O-Chi pledge, the KTs uncover a secret stash of goods stolen by former brothers. Meanwhile, Rusty and Andy are caught returning a football, after Rusty confesses to kissing Jordan. Elsewhere, Andy de-pledges, causing a rift between Rusty and Cappie. Also, Ashleigh is hesitant to take her relationship with Fisher public.

18.title: Divine Secrets of the ZBZ Sisterhood
18.plot: In an attempt to impress Cappie, Rusty tries to solve a mystery involving CRU's secret Skull and Bones society, but gets more than be bargained for. Meanwhile, two former ZBZ's who defected to IKI ask Casey if they can return, but the heads are reluctant. Also, Rebecca seeks dating advice from Calvin, as she prepares to go out with Robin.

19.title: Social Studies
19.plot: The two girls Cappie are dating end up in a study group with him and Casey. Meanwhile, Rusty is having doubts about his relationship with Jordan. Elsewhere, Rebecca and Evan try to get her laptop out of her towed car.

20.title: Isn't It Bro-mantic?
20.plot: Rusty prepares for his date with Jordan, but Casey ends up tagging along.

21.title: Tailgate Expectations
21.plot: The houses are paired against each other in a float building contest.

22.title: At World's End
22.plot: The fallout from the float prank leads the Kappa Tau house to plan a party.

1.title: The Day After
1.plot: The aftermath of the End of the World party is revealed.

2.title: Our Fathers
2.plot: ZBZ is having their Daddy-Daughter weekend and tensions run high between both the dads and the sisters when Ashleigh discovers what happened between Rebecca and Fisher and how Casey hides it. Meanwhile Rusty meets Jordan's father for the first time and things don't go as planned.

3.title: The Half-Naked Gun
3.plot: Grant and Calvin try to make their relationship work but are having difficulties dating inside the house. Meanwhile Rusty and Jordan are the last two standing in the ongoing campus game but there can only be one left standing in the end. Also Casey struggles to save the Undie Run for the sororities from much opposition from Katherine who believes that it just negatively affects the views of sororities.

4.title: High and Dry
4.plot: Rusty seeks help in trying to get his grades back up while Casey and Evan monitor dry weekend but things end up going a little unexpected. At the same time Ashleigh still refuses to give Fisher a second chance.

5.title: Down on Your Luck
5.plot: Casey and Ashleigh work hard to get the ZBZ house rank back up.

6.title: Lost and Founders
6.plot: Rusty and Jordan double date with Calvin and Grant.

7.title: The Dork Knight
7.plot: Casey tries to find out about Cappie and Evan's secret friendship while Rusty, Calvin, and Dale visit Comicon.

8.title: Fight the Power
8.plot: Ashleigh resorts to desperate measures to raise the ZBZ house ranking. Rusty misreads Cappie's feelings for Lana. Calvin and Grant disagree.

9.title: The Wish-Pretzel
9.plot: Rusty, Casey, Rebecca, Dale, Cappie and Evan either get stuck or remain on campus over Thanksgiving break.

10.title: Friend or Foe
10.plot: While Rusty and Dale continue to fight over their science project in various ways, Casey and Ashleigh preparing for the upcoming dance off between the houses.

11.title: I Know What You Did Last Semester
11.plot: Rusty tries to be pledge educator while the ZBZ's deal with the house's fire.

12.title: Pride & Punishment
12.plot: Casey feels guilty over the fire which causes her to expose the secret.

13.title: Take Me Out
13.plot: Casey and Ashleigh go on a double date.

14.title: The Tortoise & the Hair
14.plot: Casey begins to think about her possible political career.

15.title: Love, Actually, Possibly, Maybe... Or Not
15.plot: It is Valentine's Day and Casey attempts to setup Rusty and Katherine.

16.title: Your Friends and Neighbors
16.plot: The KT house gets new neighbors.

18.title: Camp Buy Me Love
18.plot: The tension between Casey and Cappie continues.

19.title: The First Last
19.plot: The ZBZ seniors push to win the last competition before they graduate.

20.title: All Children... Grow Up
20.plot: The gang returns to Myrtle Beach for Spring Break.

locations: University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, North Carolina, USA
UCLA, Westwood, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: A Freshman arrives at his sisters college (much to her dismay). He decides to pledge a fraternity on campus. After catching his sister's boyfriend with another girl, he ends up at his rival fraternity trying to go from geek to Greek and grow up in the process.
imdb.title: Greek
plot: Freshman Rusty Cartwright arrives at college and decides he no longer wants to be the boring geek from high school. He decides to pledge a fraternity. He is offered 2 bids; one from his sister's boyfriend Evan's fraternity and one from Cappie, his sister's ex-boyfriend's fraternity. Rusty must learn to handle his new life, and his new relationship with his sister. His sister must decide if she loves Evan who is stable or Cappie who really loves her.::Gatetraveler

A Freshman arrives at his sisters college (much to her dismay). He decides to pledge a fraternity on campus. After catching his sister's boyfriend with another girl, he ends up at his rival fraternity trying to go from geek to _Greek_ (qv) and grow up in the process.::gatetraveler

Freshman Rusty Cartwright arrives at Cyprus Rhodes University in search of a fresh start from his geeky high school reputation. His sister is already a student attending this school and she is is much displeased when Rusty lets her know he is rushing a fraternity! The series encounters love triangles, brother and sisterhood and the ups and downs of getting through greek life at college.

Rusty Cartwright arrives on the campus of Cyprus-Rhodes University, much to the dismay of big sister Casey. Rusty finds that his sister neglected to mention having a brother. Evan offers Rusty a spot in the Omega Chi Delta fraternity, as long as he does not tell Casey about him sleeping with Rebecca Logan (a pledge at the sorority rush who was heavily courted as she was a senators daughter). Rusty tells Casey and ends up accepting an offer from Kappa Tau Gamma president Cappie. Rusty must deal with his own life and relationships and his new relationship with Casey. Casey now has to decide between stable Evan or fun-loving Cappie whom she really loves.::gatetraveler

Freshman Rusty arrives at college and decides he no longer wants to be the boring geek from high school. Now he must deal with his sister, sorority girl Casey, who denies his existence, Evan, his sister's boyfriend who denied him a bid to his fraternity because he told Casey about his infidelity, Dale his uptight roommate who thinks _Greek_ (qv)s are only about drinking and fornication, and Calvin and his new friend who is in Evan's fraternity and having trouble dealing with his homosexuality.::Gatetraveler
